sentence.Network_cn: 米克有确凿的不在场证据。

sentence.Network_en: Store the cake in an airtight container.
sentence.Network_cn: 把蛋糕存放在密封容器里。

sentence.Network_en: Food will last longer if kept in an airtight container.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果贮藏在密封的容器里，食物能保持比较久的时间。

entry.tran: 不透气的；气密的；密封的
entry.def: If a container is airtight, its lid fits so tightly that no air can get in or out.

example.ex: Store the cookies in an airtight tin.
example.tran: 将曲奇饼干存放于密封罐中。

entry.tran: （不在场证据或案件、契约、论据）无懈可击的，没有漏洞的，严密的
entry.def: An airtight alibi, case, argument, or agreement is one that has been so carefully put together that nobody will be able to find a fault in it.

example.tran: 米克有确凿的不在场证据。

means.word_mean: 2. not allowing air or gas to pass in or out

auth_sentence.content: Pour the sugar syrup into an airtight storage jar.
auth_sentence.res_content: Pour the sugar syrup into an airtight storage jar.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Pour the sugar syrup into an airtight storage jar.

auth_sentence.content: Store between sheets of wax paper in airtight container.

sentences.en: Biscuits will stay crisp if you keep them in an airtight tin.
sentences.cn: 如果你把饼干放到一个密闭的铁罐里, 它就会保持松脆。

means.word_mean: <主美口>(防守等)严密的，无懈可击的，无漏洞的，天衣无缝的

sentences.en: The police verified that she had an airtight alibi.
sentences.cn: 警方查明她有着无懈可击的不在犯罪现场的证据。
